article.title: BAE to Deliver Upgraded Mine-Hunting Systems
article.author: George Seffers
article.text: BAE Systems Information and Electronics, Nashua, New Hampshire, is being awarded a $10 million contract modification to fabricate, assemble, test and deliver 10 AN/SQQ-32(V)4 mine-hunting sonar set high frequency wideband upgrade systems. The AN/SQQ-32(V)4 mine-hunting sonar set high frequency wideband upgrade was developed to improve shallow water mine-hunting capabilities. The Naval Sea Systems Command, Washington, D.C., is the contracting activity.
